meta_description: Professional Popo Live Agent Template. Contact @Nomoreboundary on Telegram to buy or request edits.
meta_keywords: Popo Live, Agent Template, Nomoreboundary, Telegram, Ethiopia, Website Template
hero_title: Welcome to Agent Betty personal page.
hero_subtitle: Here you will find everything you need to become a successful Popo Live user
agent_meseret_intro: It's been 5 months since I started working on Popo Live. I'm earning over 10,000 birr per month.
earn_additional_income: If you want to earn additional income like me
earn_additional_income_desc: All you need to do is follow the sequence I will show you. By the way, working on this website does not require any educational qualifications, we can work at our convenient time, we can communicate in our own language, and it gives us the opportunity to meet people from different countries around the world, which makes us enjoy the work.
opening_options_desc: Although it can be downloaded directly from the Play Store, the preferred method is to open via a link, so download it by tapping the link I've placed below
choose_what_works_desc: After downloading via the link, it will show you options for how you want to open it. Choose the method that works best for you.
the_front_page_desc: This page confirms that you've correctly opened a Popo Live account. Next, we'll go to the main settings page of the website. This is by tapping the 5th icon at the bottom of the mobile, which looks like a light bulb or "O"  ðŸ’¡
our_next_task_desc: When this comes up, tap "Auth" and first provide your photo and facial recognition. There's a doll shown here, and what we need to do is repeat what she does. There shouldn't be anything covering your face when giving your facial recognition, for example, hijab, glasses...
finally_desc: When you tap "My Agency" from what's shown in the photo at point 4, this will appear. Next, tap "Please enter agent's ID" and enter "47474070", then tap below, Betty_Agency and finally we tap "confirm" and a certificate will be shown to us.
next_step_desc: When this certificate appears above, you can bring it here by clicking "Back". After entering your ID and confirming, a certificate like this will appear showing your name at the top and your agent's name below. After that, you can simply click "Back" without doing anything else to exit.
practical_guidelines: Practical Guidelines to Become a Direct Agent
practical_guidelines_desc: Follow these guidelines to easily become an agent.
copy_popo_id: Copy your Popo ID from your profile
enter_verification_code: Enter the Verification Code and click "Submit"
what_is_poppo_live_desc: Popo Live is an international social media platform where you can earn income by chatting via live video with people from different countries. This platform provides a great opportunity to earn income in an easy and fun way.
how_does_it_work_desc: On Popo Live, you receive coins and gifts by chatting with people via live video, playing games, and participating in various social activities. These coins can be converted to real money.
income_collection_methods_desc: The main ways to earn income on Popo Live include receiving gifts, making direct video calls, participating in games, and agency work. Each activity provides a different income opportunity.
ways_to_raise_revenue_desc:
Ways to earn money on Popo Live: Daily coins given to us when we do live.
- Sender box and
- Treasure Boxes
- Playing games with others
- Gifts from different people
and agency work. We earn different amounts of income from all of these.

â€¢ Beware of people asking to transfer money

â€¢ Follow Popo Live guidelines

faq_what_is_poppo_desc: Popo Live is an international live video streaming platform where you can earn money by broadcasting live video.
faq_money_transfer_desc: Popo Live can convert coins sent by real institutions into birr; directly confirm the sent money.
faq_tips_new_users_desc: Fill in your profile properly, choose a selected agent, let the controller reach your life.
customize_template_desc: If you want us to customize this template for you, all you need to do is provide your name, photo, and various social media links. Contact us through the Telegram account below
made_with_love: Made with love in Ethiopia ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¹
